meanings.definition: A type of climbing plant with fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: The woodbines in the garden added a lovely scent to the air.
meanings.sent2: I planted some woodbines along the fence to attract butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the woodbines to swing from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweet fragrance of woodbines on a summer evening.
meanings.sent5: The woodbines entwined around the old oak tree, creating a beautiful natural decoration.

meanings.definition: A cigarette made of tobacco wrapped in a thin paper.
meanings.sent1: He lit up a woodbines and took a long drag, exhaling smoke rings.
meanings.sent2: The old man always had a woodbines dangling from his lips.
meanings.sent3: She pretended to smoke a woodbines to impress her friends, but coughed immediately.
meanings.sent4: The woodbines burned slowly, releasing a familiar scent into the room.
meanings.sent5: The detective found a discarded woodbines butt near the crime scene.
